name: about:newtab Dark by a3cAnton
description:
about:newTab Dark
See the video of style running.

https://youtu.be/UGdRaouPx18
css: /* Created  by Antonio Ferreiro "a3cAnton" 09-04-2012*/@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url("about:newtab"){ window,#newtab-scrollbox { background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.6)!important;background-image:url("chrome://browser/skin/customizableui/background-noise-toolbar.png"),linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0,.8),rgba(0,0,0,.5))!important;color:#ccf!important} .newtab-title{ text-shadow:1px 1px #000!important;border-radius:1px 12px 1px 1px!important}.newtab-site:hover,.newtab-site[dragged],#newtab-search-logo[active],#newtab-search-logo:hover,#newtab-search-submit:hover{border-color:hsla(190,50%,75%,.6) hsla(190,50%,65%,.6) hsla(190,50%,55%,.6)!important;box-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1),0 0 10px hsl(190,50%,75%)!important;transition:border-color .35s ease,box-shadow .4s ease!important}.newtab-title,#newtab-search-submit{-moz-appearance:none!important;color:hsl(210,30%,85%)!important;text-shadow:0 -1px 1px #000!important;background:#333 linear-gradient(hsla(0,0%,54%,.35),hsla(0,0%,54%,.1))!important;box-shadow:0 5px 2px hsla(0,0%,99%,.15) inset,0 -9px 5px #000 inset!important;-moz-margin-end:3px!important;transition:.3s!important } #newtab-search-submit:hover{color:hsl(190,50%,85%)!important;text-shadow:0 -1px 1px hsla(210,8%,5%,.45)!important;background:transparent linear-gradient(hsl(220,50%,22%),hsl(220,50%,54%))!important;transition:.3s!important}.newtab-site:hover span.newtab-title{background:none transparent!important;box-shadow:none!important;font-size:20px!important;color:hsla(190,50%,75%,.9)!important;text-shadow:-3px 5px 1px #000!important;transition:.25s } #newtab-search-text,#newtab-search-text div,#newtab-search-logo[active],#newtab-search-logo:hover{ background-color:transparent!important } #newtab-search-logo{border-radius:19px!important} #newtab-search-text{border-radius:19px 0 0 19px!important;box-shadow:0 1px 6px 0 #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 0 #999 inset!important;border:none!important}#newtab-search-submit{ height:38px!important;border-radius:0 19px 19px 0!important;border:none!important} #newtab-search-form #newtab-search-text:focus,#newtab-search-form #newtab-search-text:focus + input{ border:1px solid hsla(190,50%,75%,.9)!important } #newtab-search-form #newtab-search-text:active,#newtab-search-form #newtab-search-text:active + input{ border:1px solid hsla(190,0%,75%,.9)!important}}
